services.title: Studio
services.subtitle: Group Special
services.description:
A combination of natural no-makeup looks with classic studio lighting. This is the most diverse package, and is used to build or update portfolios with fresh, clear, and natural work.

Styling ranges from high-fashion editorial to commercial depending on your needs, and body or beauty looks can be intermixed on request.
